updates.update_userinfo: Not there yet but Oh So Close!
updates.update_content:
Hello Stompump Backers,
At the risk of sounding like a broken record, we are very close to delivering Stompumps. We don't have a concrete date set, but we are confident we'll begin shipping this year, and if all goes well, before Christmas!
Production of all components have been approved and are in process, the only thing left will be final assembly.

Hello all,
Things are moving right along here, and we're still looking at November for beginning Stompump shipments. We would like to discuss our delays and what we're doing with the Stompump that has taken us past our projected delivery date. 
The first thing we would like to make clear is that we absolutely will be delivering Stompumps to all of our backers. There is no question about that. Second, our main goal is to have a great product. We're willing to sacrifice some time in order to do this. We recognize that some may be disappointed or even upset with us. For this we're sorry, but we must push ahead with refining the Stompump.

Hello All,
We just returned from Interbike bike in it's new location, Reno, Nevada. We had a great time and the Stompump was very well received by the bicycle industry! 
We were very fortunate to receive an Interbike Innovation award for the Stompump. So, we're riding a bit of a high ;) We would like to share this award with all of our backers as this wouldn't have been possible without your support! Thank you so much.

updates.update_userinfo: Nearing the End and Interbike Prep
updates.update_content:
Hello All,
I know you're all getting anxious to get your Stompumps as our projected delivery date has come and gone. We're very close, so don't give up now ;)
We're currently preparing for Interbike in Reno, NV. We're excited to show some real working production samples of the Stompump. As we have a full suite of all the samples from our vendors we are gearing up to wage full scale production/assembly/shipping!

Hello All,
We received our First Article samples this week and they look great! Our contract manufacturer still needs to add the final texture to the molds, but all the critical dimensions on the parts look great! We're very excited to be at this stage. We'll keep you updated on delivery timing but at this point we're probably about 4 weeks away!

Hello all,
Everything is going smoothly here and we're pretty 'pumped' as we'll be seeing the First Articles of the injection molded plastic parts here within the week. This is great news as these are some of the most critical parts that are outsourced... We can do a lot of things here in our shop, but molding plastic parts on a mass scale is not one of them. Having these parts in hand is a big step toward delivering the Stompump to all of you, our faithful backers!

Hello All,
Well, we have been working hard on the Stompump, so not too many updates, apologies ;)
First, our surveys are set to go out this week. As mentioned in a previous update, we're using Backerkit so the process will be smooth and easy for all of our awesome backers!

campaign.story:
Gamebook is a hybrid, both an interactive book and a collection of board games.
Gamebook contains eight abstract strategy board games, carefully selected from the rich gaming heritage that represents human history, our intelligence, wit, strategy and appetite for fun, play and socialising - all gathered in one uniquely designed interactive book, for you to see, to read and most importantly - to play. 
Unlike most board games, Gamebook does not come in a box. Our quest was to think outside the box, pushing boundaries away from both traditional board game packaging and traditional book design. We aim to create a highly unique collection of board games for an international audience using high-quality design and production standards.
Gamebook is not like most books—it’s interactive. People have been playing games for all of recorded history, and there is evidence to indicate we played them before recorded history, too. We believe that games have always been an important tool for human social interaction, and Gamebook is designed to encourage this. Each game included in the Gamebook has multiple variations requiring different strategies and approaches, making each game yours to play and explore in your own unique way.
Gamebook is a collection of ancient abstract strategy board games: Surakarta, Tablut, Pachisi, Alquerque, Mu Torere, Senet, Nine Men’s Morris and Stern-halma.
We have searched the rich history of board games for untold stories. Gamebook contains eight abstract strategy board games, carefully selected from the rich world gaming heritage. Gamebook encompasses history, theory and practice of selected board games.
Assemble four boards of the Gamebook to create a new board game specially designed and developed for this edition!
Who is Gamebook for?
Gamebook contains board games ranging from two to six players. The board games were chosen based on their difficulty, from basic board games to ones requiring more complex strategies. Gamebook is appropriate for many different ages, so don't worry about who you invite to game night! :)
On the left side Hana and on the right side Ema Jesih are playing board game Alquerque.
Aesthetics and Design
All selected games are re-designed to a unified graphic language, built of basic geometrical forms by a limited range of colours. Each game has been refined to include only the essential elements necessary for gameplay, and each game board is treated as abstract art based on the textures of different drawing materials.
Magic Binding
Gamebook features two innovative designs - the box for game pieces is also the book's backbone that holds the pages together with simple and very effective magnetic binding. Every page is simply plucked out when you want to play, and put back in; you can arrange the book as you like.
Figures, sticks and a dice
Gamebook includes everything you need to start playing any of the board games. The backbone of the book contains a concealed department for all small figures, six two-sided sticks and a dice. Before the invention of dice, most board games were played with sticks, stones or cowrie shells. The flat side of the stick is the “heads up” side. Different combinations give different scores, giving a totally different dynamic to certain games.
Booklet of History and Rules
Where did board games come from? How did our ancestors play board games? Which abstract strategy board games concepts have spread around the world? The answers to these questions can be found in the booklet of History & Rules. The booklet is included on the back page of the book. You can pluck it out and read it separately so it won’t disturb the game flow of the game you're playing.
Rewards
Stretch goals
Gamebook trilogy
Research about board games has revealed a whole new world. The history of board games is full of mysteries, myths and secrets. We have created a collection of forgotten board game classics. These games are the foundation of so many modern board games. We have chosen eight board games for the first edition of Gamebook, but we would love to continue our investigation and search for lost board games around the world. There are so many more games to find, explore, study and publish. We want to make a Gamebook collection — possibly a Gamebook trilogy.
Hibird Books
Our goal is to establish our own publish company called Hibird Books. Our vision is to publish extraordinary books and to connect unseen combinations of media and materials. Hibird Books main interests are special editions, interactive books, book-objects and artist’s books. Help us bring our Gamebook project to life and many more unusual books will follow. Only time will tell where the path will end. Join us! Back us up. :)
Book Specification
Book dimensions: 32 x 28 x 2,2 cm (12.6"x11"x0.86") 
Game boards dimensions: 28 x 28 cm (11"x11") 
Weight: 1,2 kg (2.64 Ibs)
Making Gamebook prototypes
PLAY

Gamebook is mostly handcrafted. We have made several prototypes to find the best materials and a suitable shape for the book. Almost the entire book is made using recycled materials. The core of the pages and box are cardboard, and we used recycled paper for the pages and for the History & Rules booklet. The figures and dice are made of wood. The rest is a secret! If you are interested in the story of Gamebook’s creation, especially the making of Gamebook prototypes you can follow us (Hibird Books) on Instagram or Facebook.
People behind the project 
 Founders:
Hana Jesih (founder of Gamebook) is a book designer & illustrator who loves to make mind-maps, travel and is taller than Peter. You can see her other book design projects on her website or you can take a look at her gallery space on her Instagram page.
Peter Plantan (cofounder of Gamebook) is an architect who hates and loves everything at the same time and is a fan of Anthony Bourdain. You can get to know his world view on his Instagram page.
Video Credits:
Nejc Gazvoda is a film director and writer. He was in charge of the script and directing the video. He wanted to use slider in the video, we made his wish come true.
Marko Pirc takes credit for photography and shooting the presentation video. His favourite sandwich is chips with sausage and chips on the top.
Voice over: Michael Manske
Song: "Jadranje", from the original soundtrack for the film "Pot v raj" composed by Andi Koglot and Laren Polic Zdravič.
Special thanks to NEJC GAZVODA, friend no.1. Big thanks to STAŠ STANKOVIČ and MARKO PIRC from LUMULABS for all advices. They also let us work on the presentation in their office and lent us their equipment and gadgets. MARUŠA HREN for all her tips and help with bookbinding, MILENA JAKOVLJEVIČ from MEDIODROM for tips in mediamarketing, JURE TURK for IT support, NIKO KLANŠEK for business support, GREGA PLANTAN for legal advice, SAMO KRALJ for producing wooden playing sticks, IVO VESELIČ for his own versions of texts and our FAMILY for moral support and food. Thanks also to all other friends who helped us in any kind of way. ;)
Timetable
We have spent the last year researching board game history and designing and testing our Gamebook. All aspects of our designs have been thoroughly considered at each stage of the product creation process, from concept design, materials and technical aspects to numerous prototypes. It’s been a wonderful journey, and now we’re almost ready for the manufacturing stage. Only with the help of Kickstarter and, most importantly, our backers will we finally be able to bring our Gamebook project to life. If you know any friends, family, colleagues or random strangers who may be interested in our project, please help us spread the word! You can expect to receive your order by November 2018.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
During the process of making the Gamebook prototypes, we collaborated with different print shops and book manufacturers. On a technical level, the pages and binding, even though they are innovative, shouldn't present any major manufacturing difficulties. The final look and materials may change a little bit in the production process, but only to improve the durability and sustainability of the product. The main task will be to manufacture a box for figures and dice that satisfies the level of craftsmanship we stand for. Considering all the facts, we believe that everything is possible if you stand by your goals and believe in your product. We believe in ours. We will try to keep the process as simple as possible. Support our project, and in return we'll send you your own edition of Gamebook. If you have any questions or concerns, don't hesitate to post them in the comment or FAQ sections below.

campaign.story:
IN ENGLISH (link en ESPAÑOL)
We are giving away ALL the Stretch Goals!
The Southern Lady cuts through the waves, the water spraying your face as you stare out at the Caribbean sea. Lost in thought, you remember the first time you came across a Spanish Galleon. Few of you managed to escape that mess with your lives, but that marked the moment when you began forging your destiny as a pirate. Now, your reputation precedes you wherever you go, instilling fear among your enemies. Nothing will get in your way of becoming the most infamous pirate to ever sail the high seas…
Make your own destiny and become the terror of the seas in Skull Tales: Full Sail!
Skull Tales: Full Sail! is a pirate adventures board game with miniatures. Set sail on the Southern Lady and explore the beautiful Caribbean sea, ripe with fearsome enemies and amazing treasures. Fame and fortune await you!
Choose among twelve starting characters, each one with its own unique miniature, to be used on the different boards as you play through the game. Find all the information you need to start playing on their character sheets.
In Skull Tales: Full Sail! You’ll be able to play individual scenarios or embark upon an immersive campaign that threads several different scenarios together into one captivating storyline.
Skull Tales, created by David Illescas, is a semi-cooperative game for 1-5 players aged 14 and up. The approximate playing time in Campaign Mode is between 60-90 minutes for one scenario and about 150 minutes for a complete chapter (Voyage, Adventure and Port). The game also includes 52 miniatures - not counting stretch goals!
During the Voyage Phase, which simulates being on a pirate ship, we’ll be managing the crew that makes up our ship while we explore the map on the way towards our objective...or objectives! But, the Captain might have a hidden agenda that he/she is keeping from the rest of the crew…
Throughout this phase, characters will take on different jobs: steering the ship, managing boarding actions, cleaning up, or even fighting sea creatures. The idea is to gain the confidence of the crew, which will depend on where you place your character and how good he/she is at dealing with all the dangerous events you’ll be facing together. The Captain will be able to assign different tasks to the crewmembers, but watch out - the other pirates can conspire against him/her!
Unfortunately, but not surprisingly, there are a lot of things that can negatively affect crew's morale: hunger, losing battles, unexpected events, etc. If morale suffers too much, another pirate can organize a mutiny to take over the captaincy and benefit from its many privileges…
Characters will earn Trust Points as they carry out duties on the ship, and these points will turn into Prestige Points once the Voyage phase comes to an end. This way, your pirate will start to gain a fearsome reputation!
In the Adventure Phase you’ll explore mysterious islands, dangerous caves, and abandoned temples. You’ll also have the chance to pillage colonial villas and find legendary objects. However, there are frightening creatures and challenging enemies to face along the way.
The Adventure map develops as terrain tiles appear randomly according to the specifications of the scenario, making each game different!
On the Adventure board you’ll be able to see how much time you have left to carry out the mission, as well as the current danger level…
Enemies have cards that outline their characteristics and a corresponding miniature. Also, every opponent you face will have a behavior or AI that generates reactions at unpredictable times, making each adventure a challenge.
In the Port Phase your character can acquire new abilities and equipment by interacting with the residents of Tortuga Island and visiting its different locations. But be careful, this place hides secrets that can make a pirate’s fate take a turn for the worst.
Each player will have time units they’ll use to carry out actions, while making sure they are ready to go when the ship sets sail: heal wounds, learn abilities, make bets, listen out for rumors, equip and improve the ship, etc. Each location has an Event Deck, and there are also independent decks for Rumors and Captain Assignments.
The following list has everything initially included in the base game, not counting components that may have been unlocked during the Kickstarter campaign.
The base game box also comes with a quick-start 10 chapter campaign (Campaign I) and a couple of special scenarios.
The new Skull Tales miniatures have been completely remodeled and will be made with a high quality plastic that is flexible, easy to paint, and allows for more clearly detailed figures. We have already started testing and the results are spectacular.
The scale of the miniatures is approximately 30-32mm up to the eye-line and not including the base.
 (Images courtesy from Icue)
PIRATE contest! (Unlocked): Share videos, photos or audio files of your family and friends with a pirate theme. If we get 200 interactions, between Twitter & Facebook, we will include a sliding chest box to store our booty (80x80x50mm) for all the backers of the game. Additionally, we will include a new Journey card dedicated to the crew of the best submission, as well as a gift for the winning crew.
For more information.
For more information: See all our booty: the first 46 Stretch Goals.
$431000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): New Enemy: Amazons (6 miniatures). They were strong, muscular women with a height that surpassed our tallest men. They seemed taken by some strange trance, as their rage was supernatural… The true Amazonians arrive, whose legend gave name to one of the most famous rivers in the world. These warrior princesses are willing to fight to the last woman, and woe the man who stands in their way! 6 Amazonian miniatures with enemy card.
$438000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): New cards for the incident deck, adding 4 new dangers to our adventures.
$445000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): We are changing four small tile designs into two large tile designs to give scenarios more variety. This double-sided tile is like the Village tiles in that it is 4 times bigger than the smaller ones.
$460000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): New Enemy: Stranglers (4 miniatures). We came ashore in the midst of a frightful fog – you could barely see your hand in front of your face. The vast mounds of seaweed were beyond anything natural, suggesting that the tide in this area was stronger and pulled any marine life from the depths of the sea onto the beaches. When the seaweed began to move, I felt as though someone was strangling me to death. Fear overcame me, especially when I saw our pistols did little damage against the shapes covered in seaweed. Another enemy comes to join the rest of the abominations. On this occasion, we’re releasing 4 Strangler miniatures and their enemy card.
$467000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): 4 Equipment Cards (2 models). You won’t believe the beauty that I found on the last galley captured by the Brotherhood… Our market keeps on receiving new merchandise to equip your pirates with the best against their enemies. 2 x Light Blunderbuss: able to fire at adjacent enemies, but with a shorter range than pistols. 2 x Poison Vials: choose a melee weapon at the beginning of the adventure. That weapon inflicts an additional wound.
$487000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): Tarantula Anansi (Giant miniature). And Anansi came from the shadows, wrapping that pirate up in a cocoon of silk, making quick work of the poor lad… The powerful tarantula Anansi has arrived to Skull Tales: Full Sail! the Caribbean will never be safe with the presence of this supernatural beast. This time, we’re adding an enemy that brings new game mechanics with enemies that take up four spaces. The Tarantula Anansi is represented by a miniature the size of 4 spaces, and comes with her corresponding enemy card.
$494000 (Unlocked, Base Game): 5 Port Events. The chapel was quieter than usual, the silence falling over the silhouettes as they brought their offerings. This didn’t feel right… Five new events to add variety to the Port Phase.
$509000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): Campaign V complete. The Brotherhood has received what at first was thought to be a Royal order. After the initial refusal to carry it out, it has become an ultimatum. They have been accused of being behind a series of supernatural events that is reducing the free labor population in the colonies and negatively affecting profits from the slave trade. Either the Brotherhood takes charge of solving this mystery, or the British Empire will bring down all its might upon Tortuga Isle. The only clue that we have involves the appearance, however strange, of huge amounts of spider webs after each event…
$516000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): 4 Equipment Cards. You have asked us on many occasions and our armorer has listened…we’re adding one more copy of the Net, Hook, Bandoleer, and Shovel cards.
$530000 (Unlocked, Free Expansion): Character: Swordsman.  "He spent years searching for his mother’s assassin. But, although he is a master fencer, his sanity is fading away, and he now spends most of his day accusing anyone who crosses his path: “You killed my mother... prepare to die!"
We’re going to add 6 Final Boss designs to the enemy cards. Each boss will have its own personalized characteristics with different behaviors and abilities. Tlanchana, the queen of the mermaids; Oggum, herald of Yemayá; Charles Vane, Captain of the Black Sails; and Anansi, the avatar tarantula. We kept rummaging through our last treasure chest and we’ve found a pack of more than 5 cards that are being added to the ones already unlocked. What surprises are to be found on these cards?
Go to your pledge, use the "manage my pledge" button and manually add the amount of US$ for everything you would like to add. When the campaign is over, we will do a Pledge Manager that lets you confirm all of the details of your pledge.
40 Metal Pirate Coins: We have listened to the requests of many of you, and we can finally announce our new ADD-ON with 40 aged metal coins of 25mm in diameter and a thickness of about 1.5-1.8mm. With our own spectacular design, this great set of coins will bring: 20 coins in copper color, 10 in silver and 10 in gold.
Set of 12 Doors & 5 Chests: This $18 ADD-ON is for those of you want to upgrade those tokens and replace them with miniatures, or even to use them in other games. The chests are placed over the target tokens, and the doors are to be used in spaces of buildings and rooms in the Village. This set will come in a 17x13x3cm cardboard box.

He had never seen so many pirate ships at anchor, nor so much activity in the docks, Tortuga Island was more alive than ever!»

Ahoy, Pirates! (link en español)

Hi Pirates, (link en español)
“Those ships...how to describe them? I had never seen anything like them after a lifetime of fishing in the islands. They looked like shells of giant Kappas covered with metal and wood. And black fumes came out of their steel mouths decorated with pagan symbols from the Great Continent! Now everyone has abandoned the village and only my sons and I remain, praying for the help of the Kaizoku. But they haven’t answered our call...not a single day, not once...since those giants of fire arrived from the other side of the ocean.

Pirates, ahoy! (link en español)

Tortuga is the first expansion for Skull Tales: Full Sail!

Backpacks always feel light in the morning. But by the time you're handed your morning coffee, or are waiting for the metro, or are on mile 0.2 of your hike, you realize your bag feels heavy — meaning your muscles are already tired or strained.
Strain is a stretching or tearing of your muscles or tendons. Doing this day in and day out causes serious damage. 
SuperStraps is a beautifully engineered, minimalist gadget you can retrofit on your favorite everyday backpack to…
Instantly relieve shoulder, back and neck tension when your bag gets heavy 
Make your backpack actually feel lighter 
Convert it to an ergonomic carry so you can walk with great posture
It’s important because 80% of us have or will have back and neck pain in our lives, and when you’re in pain it stops you from doing what you love. SuperStraps both protects and relieves you, depending on your state.
  Use our Add-On Pledge Calculator for quick math :-)
Every reward includes the Back Pain Survival Guide
                              The creator of SuperStraps, Katherine Krug, also created the #1 best selling posture improvement and back pain relief device: BetterBack. Collecting and testing wisdom from hundreds of experts from around the world, The Back Pain Survival Guide, has the essential exercises, stretches and practices to optimize your back and neck health.
*Reward Delivered Digitally
PLAY

Now we need you. 
You don’t need to live in pain, and you shouldn’t. It’s completely in your reach. Plus, good posture affects your productivity, your health, your happiness. Back our project right now to bring SuperStraps to life and to join our truly amazing community of backers from 115 countries. We are all on a journey to a better back together. Join us.
                                How to Pledge

3. When we get close to shipping, we will send you a survey to collect your shipping information.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are Type A+. This is great for you and maybe bad for our significant others. We sweat every detail and are obsessed with delivering you something that will make you wanna break into a slow clap. We run a tight ship and run conservative on what we promise. We've delivered over 35,000 crowdfunded products on time and love bringing our backers along for every part of the journey. Expect updates with pics and manufacturing challenges we are overcoming over the next few months before SuperStraps hits your favorite backpack. 

Where we are now:
We have spent the last year and a half engineering SuperStraps and extensively testing over 6 rounds of machined prototypes. We've been working days and nights with manufacturers over the past 4 months and have fully set up our supply chain.

Where we are heading:
The biggest challenge we face in this project is tooling. It takes about 6 weeks to make the molds we need and then we begin the process of refinement. We won't stop until it's perfect and we've padded our timeline to account for multiple rounds of tweaking. We just can't know for sure how long it will take to reach perfection. We will have Josh, our lead Industrial Designer and modern-day MacGyevor, to thank when we've cleared this hurdle. 

We've had over 900 SuperStraps Ambassadors help us refine various designs on SuperStraps, but we want to get your input too. Throughout the campaign, we will be sending surveys (totally optional to participate in) to collect your feedback and bright ideas during the manufacturing process.

We are so excited to embark on this epic journey with you, building the world's first backpack booster. So excited to have you join us.

campaign.story:
Inspired by the legendary tales of horror, myth and folklore by Mike Mignola, Hellboy: The Board Game is a fully cooperative experience for 1 to 4 players. You become a member of the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defence (BPRD), ready to investigate occult threats that threaten our very existence. You will explore gothic locations, hunt down clues, discover artefacts, fight horrific creatures and face off against terrifying bosses.
For more details about the 'Box Full of Evil' click here.
For full details of what's included in the Darkness Calls expansion, click here.
 For full details of what's included in the Hellboy in Mexico expansion, click here.
RESIN MINIATURES
For more details on the resin miniatures, please check here.
Designed by James M. Hewitt - the brains behind the likes of Blood Bowl 2016, Necromunda: Underhive, and Warhammer Quest: Silver Tower - Hellboy: The Board Game features incredibly detailed, pre-assembled PVC plastic miniatures that capture the unique look and feel of Mike Mignola’s visionary work.    
Miniatures supplied unpainted.
Hellboy: The Board Game gives you the chance to take control of an iconic member of the BPRD. Choose from Hellboy, Abe Sapien, Liz Sherman and Johann Kraus before equipping your agent with additional items that will help in the mission ahead. Each trinket, charm or weapon costs money though, so you’ll need to spend wisely.    
Artwork and text subject to approval.
Each of the missions in the core game begins by reading a BPRD Case File. This will set the scene for the investigation ahead and give hints about what threats you may encounter. The contents of each Case File are top secret, so the first time you play you'll have no idea what you're about to face!   
Miniatures supplied unpainted.
During play, agents must carefully balance the Information Gathered track against the ominous Impending Doom track. Information Gathered represents the clues you uncover about the monster you’re hunting, while the Impending Doom track marks how close humanity is to the brink of destruction.   
Artwork and text subject to approval.
Do you spend valuable time investigating the scene to find a vital piece of the puzzle that could expose a crucial weakness of your foe, but risk the Impending Doom track reaching its devastating finale? Or do you forget the clues and rush through to a final confrontation before the monster has gathered its strength? No one said being a BPRD Agent would be easy.   
Miniatures supplied unpainted.
Ahead of the climatic battle, you’ll have to face all manner of creatures that lurk in the shadows, ready to pounce at a moment’s notice. When the chips are down, it’s time to fight back using an intuitive system of custom coloured dice. Each BPRD agent has a range of special abilities they can use to defeat their enemies, or they can team up when things get really tough.   
Artwork and text subject to approval.
What’s more, no two missions will ever play the same thanks to the terrifying Deck of Doom. Each turn players unveil a Deck of Doom card, which could trigger a new onslaught from the arcane horrors hiding in the location, initiate a special event or simply move the Impending Doom track closer to its dramatic end.     
Artwork and text subject to approval.
No matter what your decisions are during the course of the mission, each play through will always end in an epic final confrontation with one of Hellboy's most notorious adversaries. The board itself changes to reveal the boss' lair and then all gloves are off for a desperate struggle against the forces of evil.  
Kickstarter exclusive box artwork drawn by Mike Mignola!
We currently estimate Hellboy: The Board Game (core game) will contain the following components*:
10 double sided room tiles (2.5mm thick, a mix of 2x2 and 1x2 with a linen finish)
4 Agent Cards
50+ cardboard tokens (damage counters, HQ board markers, target priority counters, furniture, doors, flame markers, etc., 2.5mm thick, with a linen finish)
13 custom dice
Three narrative Case File scenarios (tarot card sized, 310GSM, lined finish, each scenario includes between 6-8 cards)
Card HQ Board (linen finish)
74 Mini Cards (310 GSM, linen finish, Encounter Cards, Back-Up Agent details, Equipment and Starting Items)
48 Standard Cards (310GSM, linen finish, Deck of Doom Cards and Enemy Cards)
18 plastic cubes (Agent action tokens and generic black tokens)
Coloured bases to fit on Agents
Rulebook
*these are given as a guidance because the game is currently in development. We will keep backers updated with any changes to components
BPRD ARCHIVES EXPANSION
Also included in your pledge is the BPRD Archives expansion. This is an opportunity for you to create your own BPRD Mission Case File. You start by choosing the location – will it be an abandoned mansion, spooky graveyard, or something more sinister? Then select the foe you want to face in the final confrontation or just leave it to chance, so it's a mystery until the dramatic climax!
Work in progress Case File cards. Artwork/text subject to approval.
Once you’ve created the Case File, it’s time to make the accompanying Deck of Doom. You’ve got complete control to make the game as easy, or as challenging as you want by selecting the Deck of Doom cards and then shuffling them together. These will then be drawn as you're playing through the mission.   
Artwork and text subject to approval.
Finally choose your Encounter Cards. These will dictate what's inside each room and what monsters you will face. Combine these with your  Enemy Cards to battle against wild creatures, hideous Frog Monsters or Nazi soldiers. The choice is yours!  
Future releases and expansions will feature elements that can be combined with the BPRD Archives, so the experience will keep growing and the gameplay will keep changing long after you've finished your first adventure.
   MINIATURES
We've worked extremely hard to capture the style of the Hellboy comics. Each miniature has been approved by Mike Mignola himself and we've taken his feedback on board to make them as stunning as possible.
PLAY

Each miniature will be made from high quality grey PVC plastic and will be pre-assembled, so they're ready to go straight from the box. As you can see in the image below some of the miniatures are huge and will look amazing during play.  
 The videos below use the prototype components we have been using for playtests. The designs/components used are definitely not final but will give you an idea of how the gameplay works.  

Shipping is NOT included in your pledge and will be calculated/charged once the campaign has completed. We recommend waiting until the pledge manager to add the exact amount required. See below regarding import duties and taxes.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There are a number of risks with any Kickstarter project, especially getting accurate timings for such complex products with so many components. 

With this project, the rules are currently in testing and will require more playtesting, however we have a dedicated team of playtesters to help with this. Many of the miniatures are already designed and approved by Mike Mignola but some are still in concept stage. Once we have all the miniatures designed, the next part of the process is the tooling and production. We predict that we will begin shipping in February 2019 - however, the exact timing is impossible to predict and there is always the potential for delay with products produced in China. We will of course keep our backers up to date as best we can once the project closes.

To date, we’ve successfully fulfilled 11 Kickstarter campaigns: Kings of War, DreadBall, LOKA, Mars Attacks: The Miniatures Game, Deadzone, DreadBall Xtreme, Dungeon Saga, Kings of War 2nd Edition, Deadzone: Infestation, The Walking Dead: All Out War and DreadBall Second Edition.

We currently have four outstanding Kickstarters awaiting completion: the remaining Warpath vehicles are shipping to backers now, wave two of Star Saga: The Eiras Contract is currently going into production and is expected to ship shortly afterwards, TerrainCrate will begin shipping in May/June, and for Kings of War: Vanguard the miniatures are in tooling and resin is already in production ready for later this year.

REFUNDS

Upon request refunds may be given within 30 days of the campaign ending, including fees. Following that time, refunds may be given minus Kickstarter and payment fees. In order to request a refund you must contact support@manticgames.com

TERMS AND CONDITIONS

By backing this campaign you acknowledge that the components, artwork and game elements for Hellboy: The Board Game are subject to approval by Dark Horse Comics and Mike Mignola. This means some elements may differ from those shown here following the Kickstarter campaign.

If you do not complete the pledge manager within the time specified when the pledge manager is sent, you agree that your contribution to the campaign was a donation and your pledge is fulfilled. Of course, we will use our discretion on a case by case basis. Completing the pledge manager is the ONLY way for us to confirm your shipping address and pledge details, as well as making sure we hit the production timelines. 

By pledging on this Kickstarter you agree that will pay for any shipping and any import or other duties required in your country. You also accept that you are liable for providing us with the correct shipping details upon request and we are not responsible for items lost in transit if sending to an incorrectly provided address. We also cannot ship to PO boxes and you must provide an alternative shipping in this circumstance.

Although we are aiming to deliver Hellboy: The Board Game to Kickstarter backers before the game is available at retail, production and shipping delays can lead to delivery at the same time or following the retail release. 

If you do not agree to these terms, then please purchase the game once it's available at your friendly local gaming store in 2019.

campaign.story:
Dinosaur Island is the product of an insanely successful Kickstarter last Spring. We were lucky to have the backing of over 6,000 awesome fans worldwide.  We released the retail edition in late 2017 and then something unexpected happened.  It sold out instantly and started going for ridiculous prices on the secondary market.   Then our backers started raving about the game online.  Tom Vasel of the Dice Tower named it one of his top 5 games of 2017 and we were awarded with 4 Golden Geek nominations including strategy game of the year, thematic game of the year, best artwork and presentation and overall game of the year.  It's been a wild ride for Dino Island since it was first unleashed on the world just a few months ago.
Dinosaur Island has been sold out since about the moment it went on sale and we've heard the constant calls to make the Kickstarter exclusives from the last campaign available again.  And we've been listening.
Dinosaur Island is a hot new game from designers Jonathan Gilmour (Dead of Winter) and Brian Lewis; from Pandasaurus Games with amazing, technicolor, ridiculously 90s artwork from Kwanchai Moriya and Peter Wocken.  
1-4 Players; 60-150 minutes (scalable length regardless of player count), ages 10+  
In Dinosaur Island, players will have to collect DNA, research the DNA sequences of extinct dinosaur species and then combine the ancient DNA in the correct sequence to bring these prehistoric creatures back to life. Dino cooking! All players will compete to build the most thrilling park each season, and then work to attract (and keep alive!) the most guests each season that the park opens. Do you go big and create a pack of Velociraptors? They'll definitely excite potential guests... but you better make a large enough enclosure for them. And maybe hire some (read: a lot of) security. Or they WILL break out and start eating your guests—and we all know how that ends. You could play it safe and grow a bunch of herbivores... but then you aren't going to have the most exciting park in the world (sad face). So maybe buy a roller coaster or two to try and attract guests to your park the good old fashioned way?   
The X-treme editions are a chance for us at Team Pandasaurus to add some really fun stuff to Dinosaur Island that we can't afford to include at retail.
For the base game, that means bringing back almost all of the stretch goals from Dinosaur Island 1.0.  The Dino Meeples, new slimmer metal coins, researcher Beaker Meeples and all of the Kickstarter exclusive plot twists (Purple Die, VIP Meeples, Extra Hooligans) that weren't able to include in the retail edition of the game for cost reasons.  Oh, and a brand new slap-bracelet first player marker that is exclusive to the X-Treme edition.  And of course, spot UV and metallic ink on the box lid!
And for backers of Dino Island 1.0?  As a thank you, any backers who jump into this new campaign for either Duelosaur or Totally Liquid will get the new slap-bracelet as a free thank you for supporting us a second time around!
For Duelosaur Island and Totally Liquid it means a new X-treme edition box with spot UV box, metallic ink box and stretch goals that we can't afford to include in the retail editions of these games.  These will be Kickstarter exclusive editions that will not be available at retail, so grab 'em now!
Upgrade Kits: For those of you who may already have a copy of Dinosaur Island and want an upgrade kit (all the X-treme edition goodies minus the exclusive Spot UV/foil cover art), we are going to offer that after the end of the campaign during the backer-kit or you can add 30 dollars to your pledge now per upgrade kit you want.  These are only available as an add-on item to another pledge tier and will ship when those items are available.  
We've been asking players what they wanted from a Dinosaur Island expansion for the last year+ and have been listening, working and testing (and testing, and testing) and Dinosaur Island: Totally Liquid is the result!  We'll be revealing Water Dinoz, new extensions and executives throughout the campaign so keep your eyes glued here for new content!
And yes, we have been listening.   Introducing Moriya Labs, the 5th player expansion for the game!
Dinosaur Island: Totally Liquid adds lots of cool new mechanisms to the game on top of a 5th player setup.  The Blueprint Module gives all players bonus points for following the plans laid out on the card!   
The Park extension gives players a new extension to the board that gives them a unique way to score points and unique mechanics to explore separately from all other players.  The Executive Worker gives each player a unique worker to their corporation that acts completely differently from any other worker in the game.  
Below you see some examples from Mega Rex who is a really hard to make dinosaur (2 of each advanced DNA!) and is extra dangerous, but the guests love him!  Build seating and up to 8 guests will come to see him!   The CFO worker gives you a new way to make money by placing him on an item in the marketplace and gaining the payment for yourself instead of the bank!
 And we're just getting started.  PR events will be introduced during the campaign along with additional Executive workers and Park Extension boards!
Check out all the shmancy components in Totally Liquid!
Pandasaurus Games is proud to announce a brand new stand-alone 2 player sequel to Dinosaur Island: Duelosaur Island!  
Designed by Ian Moss and developed by Dinosaur Island designer Jon Gilmour, Duelosaur has completely unique mechanics that make it an amazing experience that is sure to add to anyone’s collection.
Duelosaur Island brings back a lot of the same feeling that players loved about Dinosaur Island, but introduces an entirely new hand-management tableau-building engine that is unlike anything you’ve seen in Dinosaur Island, and a really tense “I cut you choose” dice drafting mechanic.  The first-player will roll the DNA dice and give each die a different bonus, with the second player choosing the DNA to take first.  So, do you give the DNA you want the best bonus and risk your opponent taking it?
Duelosaur is built around a clever hand management mechanism. Each card in the game serves 3 potential purposes. They contain the DNA sequences for dinosaurs you could create, the blueprints for attractions you can build and also are discarded to take certain actions. Do you create the Dinosaur on the top of the card attracting guests to your park? Or do you build the attraction on the bottom of the card, which can grant PR bonuses, income and end-game VP? Or do you discard the card to combine DNA towards creating another dinosaur. Duelosaur Island comes with 5 brand new full-color “DNA dice”. You can mix and match dice between Dinosaur Island and Duelosaur Island for even more variability in both games. Adding a copy of Duelosaur Island to your collection is going to unlock lots of cool new possibilities in Dinosaur Island like the brand-new security symbol that can appear on dice to upgrade your security level instantly! Mixing these dice in with the Dinosaur Island dice is a great way to add replayability to both Duelosaur Island and Dinosaur Island.
Dinosaur Island Rulebook
Dinosaur Island: Totally Liquid  Alpha Rulebook (non-final layout, non-final text)
Duelosaur Island  Alpha Rulebook (non final layout, non-final text)
Pandasaurus Games will be working with partners to deliver the game worldwide. This project will be EU, Canada, China, US and Australia friendly!  
After the campaign ends, we will be charging actual shipping costs. We want to strike a fair balance of value for our backers while ensuring high quality fair shipping prices for each backer. By shipping within the EU, Australia, China, Canada and the United States we are hoping to get as favorable of shipping rates as possible. We will be working with well-vetted partners in each region who have experience with Kickstarter reward fulfillment and come highly recommended by other publishers within the industry, and will take into account good (and bad) experiences that other publishers have experienced.  
Our goal is for the average shipping costs for backers in the EU, US, Canada, Australia and China to be under 20 USD with shipping for backers outside of these regions to come from the most cost-effective area for the lowest possible shipping price.  
Backers in some regions, especially the Middle East, Africa, South and Central America may experience high shipping fees which reflect the actual cost of shipping to these areas in excess of 50 USD. Please be aware of this before backing the project.
We are proud to partner with Quartermaster Logistics, the premier provider of Kickstarter fulfillment in the gaming industry. Your games will be safely packed by their professional team, and you’ll be emailed a tracking number when your package ships. Learn more about Quartermaster Logistics at qmlogistics.com
Splitting Shipments
After the campaign ends, we will allow backers to split shipments of titles so that they ship as they become available.  This will be up to individual backers if you wish to get games earlier or wait for all items to become available to ship together to save money.   
For example if you pledge for the base game + Totally Liquid we expect the base game to be available this Summer while Totally Liquid won't be ready until the Fall.  You may choose to split the shipment to get the base game first or you can wait until both are ready to ship to save on shipping costs.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Pandasaurus Games is a 6-year-old board game publisher who has delivered hundreds of thousands of board games worldwide. We are confident in our ability to deliver the rewards listed and on time.

Duelosaur and the base game are art complete and set to begin the pre-proof process with the printer during the campaign to ensure timeliness. Totally Liquid is 80% art complete and will finish during the campaign. Short of a production issue with some of the bespoke components, delays in shipping or issues with proofing that require reworks, we intend to release the game on time. We will always choose quality production over timeliness, so delay of the game is possible, but we will be ready to hit the printer with final components right at the end of the campaign.

There is the chance of delay in shipping or customs that is largely out of the control of our company, but we are experienced in moving products through customs. Of course, with multiple freight solutions going to various parts of the world it's possible some regions will get the game more quickly than others. Our goal is to ship the game as soon as it lands on any continent, so we'll have to ask for your patience if some regions get the game before others.

INSANITY  Player do not lose sanity in the same way. After performing certain actions, draw from the insanity deck. Many of the cards do not cause a loss of sanity. Those that do will change the player's ability to investigate, gamble, vote, accuse, research, and contribute.
GODS For the basic game use the 4 gods without special rules (Ithaca, Zahr, Bokrug, and Dagon). For a deeper game and even more replay value add in any number of the additional 8 additional gods included in the game.
 Here are the 8 Gods with special triggers (advanced rules).
EQUIPMENT What does equipment do?  Each equipment item will give an investigator a unique action to be used once during the game or in a few cases, up to 3 times. 
THE NECRONOMICON When the chances of creating all 4 sigils before the clock reaches midnight looks bleak, there is something that can be done. Your team can vote to consult the Necronomicon. This is a dangerous and risky proposition. The Investigators may buy themselves some additional time, but failure will mean an immediate and gruesome end. AND one Investigator must volunteer to open the book and take on additional insanity.
CONTINUE TO PLAY EVEN IF YOU ARE FOUND OUT   
No players are eliminated from the game. A discovered cultist is weaken (flip their player card over) and become a bit pesky. They can no longer vote (who would listen to them?), but they still need to be dealt with.

campaign.story:
Miskatonic University: The Restricted Collection
 Hi, I'm Susan, the board games line editor for Chaosium.
Last year, after some 25 years away, Chaosium got back into boardgames. This first foray brought together Reiner Knizia and "the Grand Shaman of Games" himself Greg Stafford, for the family game Khan of Khans set in the mythic world of Glorantha. Now we're back with a Kickstarter for our first Lovecraftian board game since 1987! I'm excited to be working with Reiner again, exploring the world of horror in a fast-paced, fun-filled, push-your-luck game.

Set in the treacherous and terrifying Restricted Collection of Miskatonic University's Orne Library, the game features grimoires, elder signs, academic politics and madness — and that endlessly renewable resource, graduate students! We hope you'll join us on our journey by supporting this Kickstarter and make the Miskatonic University game a reality!
The Details
The game comes in an awesome box (8" x 6" or 20cm x 15cm), disguised as a book. Very appropriate for a game about libraries!
 What's in the box?
5 Player Desk Boards 
80 Library Cards
5 sets of Defense Cards 
Scoring Cards 
Rule Book  
The Story 
The game is a quest.  An extremely dangerous quest. Dr Henry Armitage, Chief Librarian, needs you to search the perilous Restricted Collection for fragments of lore from among the grimoires, and recover pieces of a particular sigil.

It all began when, as leading scholars at Miskatonic University, you were gathered together to discuss who would be awarded the coveted position of Head of the Library Committee. Suddenly tragedy and horror struck—a monster had been unleashed, presumably by some foolish graduate student! Dr. Armitage leapt into action and asked for your help. He needs you to gather the necessary tools to banish the foul abomination.

You explore the Restricted Collection for the grimoire fragments and sigils he needs. However it is a perilous journey and you must be prepared to flee before you are driven mad! The victor is the professor who finds the most sets, while retaining a semblance of sanity. Also, look out for hapless wandering graduate students as they can aid in your defenses!
How to Play
There are five rounds in the game. Each round continues until no-one is left in the library, having left "voluntarily" or having been expelled. 
Basic play consists of taking turns to select a Library Card and placing these cards face up on your player mats.
There are three types of Library Cards. Sigil Pieces, Grimoire Fragments and Graduate Students, that fit neatly into the player mat:
There are two ways to exit the library. Choosing to leave or being expelled:
 Defense cards are a key part of the game:
 You win by having the highest score:
Game End 
The game ends when the final fifth round is played. 
You then add up all the score cards they have received and the one with the highest score wins! 
The winning scholar will become the head of the Library committee! And armed with the sigil pieces and grimoire fragments you collected, Dr. Armitage heads out into the night to take on the monster. He beckons you to follow him . . .
Videos
Our Board Games Line Editor, Susan, shows how the game is set up to play
.
PLAY

Susan discusses how the game unfolds...
PLAY

Here is actual play of the game, recorded in the chapel at Schloss Neuhausen, Germany in October 2017. Please note, the game components used here are a prototype, but the game play and rules are exactly the same as in the final version that will go to publication. Playing, from left to right, are Neil, Susan and MOB from the Chaosium team. 
Many thanks to The Kraken, the "baroque gathering of international gamers, gamemasters and game creators", where this video was filmed.
The Design and Development Team
Game Design: Reiner Knizia
Development: Susan O'Brien
Additional Development: Mike Mason
Graphic Design: Ian O'Toole
Art: Victor Leza, Goomi
Miskatonic University: The Restricted Collection is © Dr. Reiner Knizia and Chaosium Inc 2018. All rights reserved. Miskatonic University is the registered trademark of Chaosium, Inc.
Stretch Goals
It wouldn't feel like a Kickstarter if we didn't have at least a few stretch goals and surprises in store as we go forward. We will announce these as the campaign proceeds...
Rewards
You'll see in the pledge levels, aside from the game itself we have some extra rewards.  Here's some more details about these:
Pledge Levels
We have 10 different pledge levels, starting at student and progressing up to Dean of as yet unnamed new departments. Along with the basic level of professor, where you get the game, we have opportunities for you to join a fraternity or sorority where you can nominate the name of those graduate students wandering the Restricted Collection!
Or you can choose to be a valedictorian, with a special plaque to prove it! There are vacancies for the Vice Chancellor, the Chancellor, or even a prestigious position as a member of the Board of Trustees. 
SHIPPING
What about shipping? We hate the high cost of shipping, and have worked hard to set up the fulfillment of the rewards so they get shipped as quickly and inexpensively as possible. We do not expect to make any money from our shipping charges. However, we also cannot afford to lose money on shipping. The way it will work is after the campaign we will send out a survey to gather your addresses. We will use this data to get the most detailed shipping pricing we can based on our actual cost to ship your reward level to your home and then charge you that amount. We will ship from fulfillment centers in the US, Canada, the EU, and Australia. More locations may be added based on where backers are located. The approximate weight of the game will be under one kilogram (under two pounds), including the shipping box and packing material. We are also likely to use BackerKit to help us with fulfillment and final order processing.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Chaosium has learned a great deal from its past Kickstarter projects. Our last board game Kickstarter, Khan of Khans, was delivered to backers on time as promised. Again, every item for this project has been created. There is no writing, editing, layout, or art to be done for the core game; ALL of those things are done. 

Miskatonic University: The Restricted Collection is ready to go to the printers, and we are only waiting to see if we can eek out some more fun from a few simple stretch goals. Needless to say, there is always the potential for production and delivery issues to crop up, but we have faced such hurdles before and will triumph.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Hermetica is a comphrensive library of esoteric symbols, lovingly crafted for design enthusiasts. 
I started this project in 2012 when I couldn't find a set of both astrological and astronomical symbols that matched a flyer typeset entirely in Helvetica, or one another.  So I started to draw symbols, and it ballooned into a massive project of now over 750 symbols in categories ranging from Alchemy and Astrology to Norse, Slavic, Celtic, Egyptian, and Mesopotamian Mythology, to Cults and Hobo Code. 

The current version, without the webfont format, is available for purchase on my website.

Stage 1: Hermetica
I've already finished the entire set in the dark weight, and all that's left is to finish making it into a webfont.
Stage 2: Hermetica Light
Next I will produce the 'light' weight, a hairline version of all 750+ symbols in the 'dark' weight.
Stage 3: PostersI will design a poster as a reward (see below), as well as 25 custom posters as a more expensive reward.
 and... T-shirts!  XS,S,M,L,XL. Screen printed on American Apparel tees.  Available in white or black.
and the Hermetica screen-printed canvas tote bag!
Stage 4: (Stretch Goal: $10,000)
If I raise more than $10,000 I will research and produce an oversize coffee table book that you can buy.
Not the real layout - mock-up only!
Why are you making this?
Before I made Hermetica, I couldn't find a single complete, cohesive set of symbols to use for my projects. Other symbol resources were an ugly hodge podge of different styles and qualities, scattered across many different sources. What's more, sources often disagreed on the name and design, and no one offered these symbols as vector artwork.
"There ought to be a 'Helvetica' of Symbols", I thought - standardized, simple, beautiful - and vectorized. And so over the course of a few years I devoted myself to researching and designing these 750 beautiful symbols to share with you - graphic designers, artists, tattoo artists, fashion designers, ceremonial magicians, activists, and aesthetes and symbol-lovers of all kinds.
B007 Celestial Objects › Saturn
What about symbols of Hate?
This was an ethical question I asked myself while creating Hermetica. I decided to keep a select few symbols that have come to be associated with hate groups, because the symbols can also be useful to people who are using them to fight hate groups. For example, an anti-fascist group has just as much need for a Nazi swastika as does a neo-fascist. And in some cases, symbols with a long cultural tradition and different meaning in another culture were later appropriated by hate groups.
D007 Alchemy › Sulfur (Alternate)
Why didn't you include __________?
I tried to be as comprehensive as possible, but after working on this for years, I needed to draw a line (no pun intended) and just finish it. In the future I would like to add more American Indian/Mesoamerican, African, and Indigenous Australian symbols.
I also found that a lot of these symbols don't lend themselves to the "Helveticization" that I employed in creating the other, mostly 'western' symbols.
I003 Celtic › Triquetra
Thank you for your support!
K001 Egyptian › Khephra

Hello supporters, 
I know that I said I wasn’t going to post an update until everything was done and ready to send out, but  someone emailed my current employer, who happens to also be a good friend of many years who is well aware of my work on Hermetica, and proceeded to describe me and my efforts here in the most libelous of terms, and it seemed like an update was necessary.

updates.update_userinfo: Don't worry - I haven't gone anywhere!
updates.update_content:
Hi guys,

I get that many of you are concerned about receiving your rewards.  There are a lot of Kickstarter horror stories out there and I acknowledge haven't been very communicative. (though I did say in my last update I wasn't going to update you again until I was done with the light version)  

I am still working on this.  Please believe me when I say, every reward will be honored.    In my last update I tried to tell you that I have very little time unfortunately in which I can afford to work on the remaining rewards, the major piece of which of course is the Light version of Hermetica.  Right now I have totally finished about 80% of the artwork, and work is ongoing.   It's going to get done, and the $20 backers and above will be sent their rewards with links to download, as all of the $10 backers have already.  

If you don't believe I'm working on it, here's a preview of the completed Hermetica light glyphs:

Dear backers,
Because I can't keep up with all of your messages individually, I wanted to update you all here.
So far only the $10 rewards have been sent out. Many of you have already received that download link, and are enjoying their copy of Hermetica, and I understand some had trouble with the download system, and I have been working with these folks individually to get their rewards to them. If You have not received your $10 reward yet, I will get it to you as soon as I can.
I am pleased to introduce a new reward... T-shirts, in both black and white!

Thanks to all of your generous support, we have almost tripled the initial goal of $3000. Kickstarter has marked Hermetica as "projects we love", and it's gaining traction! I am so grateful for this opportunity to realize a creative dream I've had for years.
So from this point I am going to operate under the assumption that the book can happen, and to make sure it's the best it can possibly be I am going to court publishers and try to figure out the breakdown of production costs. Once that is done I will begin to offer the book here for presale/as a reward.

*THIS CAMPAIGN'S CONTENT IS A KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE AND THESE SETS WILL NOT BE AVAILABLE AT RETAIL! (This is your chance to participate in this celebration!) 
Missed the campaign? You can enter our Late Pledge Manager by clicking the above image. The Late Pledge Manager opens May 8th, and supplies are limited.
Now the whole Street Fighter Universe is literally at your fingertips! What are you waiting for?!  
Help Ryu on his journey to surpass all Stretch Goals! Each one we unlock is added to your pledge for Free! We've planned for 12 additional fighters & battle decks to be unlocked during the campaign! With all those unlocked you get TRIPLE the size of a Base Pledge at the Street Fighter Level!
We wanted to make our miniatures so good that even if you didn't play the game at all, your pledge would still be fully worth it for these impressive works of art alone - and at their Collectors Scale, they are wonderful pieces to display around your home or office!  
Street Fighter: The Miniatures Game uses a unique scale, the brand new "Collector's Scale"! This giant-sized scale has your models large and in charge from 65mm tall all the way up to 85mm tall on some characters all on a standardized 58mm base! We will be offering this scale for all our future Universal Tactics System Games.   
This size offers tons of advantages:
The miniatures are more like small collectable statues and makes them great for displaying around the house even if you don't play the game at all!  
The larger the mini the better the pre-paint process, our pre-painted miniatures are simply the best the industry can currently offer, rivalling that of action figures and full sized collector statues!  
Playing with larger miniatures on a board with 3D terrain gives amazing table presence when you pull this game out at any gathering! You'll be the talk of the town!  
We believe its quality over quantity, why have buckets of tiny miniatures if they don't get played packed away in expansion box after expansion box? These miniatures will get a lot of table time as your sole representation on the battlefield!  
Take a look at our featured miniatures video below!
Let us get a detailed look at each one of our fighters included in the Core Set!
Adding a NEW DIMENSION to Street Fighter!  
Destructible Stage Terrain adds a new exciting element to the Street Fighter experience and it adds a new layer of strategic depth to the game as you attempt to out outmaneuver your opponent and set them up for extra damage!  
Each round the terrain is reset and the fighter positions swapped as to offer an equal opportunity to both players, plus its just more fun to crash into more stuff. Smart awareness, positioning and baiting your opponent can easily win you the day!  
HOW TO PLAY THE GAME. IT'S SIMPLE!  
We wanted anyone to be able to jump right in and play! So we had to make learning the game simple, but yet still have the depth to please experienced gamers and fighting game fans. This was an extremely challenging task for sure, especially when you consider the game system is built not only for Versus Mode but also Free for All and Team Games, essentially three games in one! However after 2 years of development we've believe we have found the right balance between accessibility, strategy, luck and fun factor!  
It's as Simple as.... DRAW. MOVE. FIGHT!
1. DRAW! - Draw 2 cards from your Battle Deck as you start your turn. Skipping this only for the first turn you take.
2. MOVE! - Move your character up to their Movement Value in any direction.
3. FIGHT! - Take 2 Actions in any order and in any amount from these Actions:  MOVE, DRAW, or PLAY A CARD.
On defense your choice is even easier but yet still an important tension filled decision. Do you BLOCK or COUNTER-ATTACK?
BLOCK - Roll two default Battle Dice and apply results vs opponent's attack roll.  You may also discard certain cards with defensive dice values to "BOOST" your Block Roll.
-OR-
COUNTER-ATTACK - Play a Counter for a Strike, Special or Projectile, if successful discard opponents card and perform Counter-Attack Ability, usually causing damage during your opponents turn!
And that's how the game works! 
As you roll your Battle Dice & play your cards you will gain meter results which contribute to your Meter Gauge allowing you to enhance certain attacks or save these for the powerful Super and Ultra Combos that can finish your opponents instantly! Best 2 rounds out of 3 WINS!
 CLICK THE IMAGE BELOW TO DOWNLOAD THE BETA RULEBOOK!
Click the Image above to Download the BETA Rulebook!
The Boss Expansion adds in two extremely powerful Street Fighter Bosses. The power level of these bosses is so immense that other players will need to team-up to defeat them in a near hopeless final battle! Here's what's in the set in more detail!  
Street Fighter: The Miniatures Game Boss Expansion includes everything you need to introduce extremely powerful Boss characters. This expansion also includes the Boss Mode game rules in which one player controls the boss in a battle against a team of three rival players! Can you and your friends stop this evil-doer's dastardly plan?  
BOSS EVENT DECKS  
Every Boss comes with a unique Event Deck that can change the battlefield conditions dramatically, forcing the players to cooperate and strategize to deal with the new threat! Each new boss game is a different experience as only 6 to 8 of these events are drawn each game on average!
BOSS FIGHTER BATTLE DECKS
In addition to the Boss Mode, the Boss Expansion includes normal 40-Card Boss-Fighter Decks so that the boss can join in with the rabble and fight on a more even level with their opponents in Versus, Free For All, and Team Modes!
If you would like to purchase any of these optional add-on's, please click the "Manage Your Pledge" button on this games Kickstarter Page and in the pledge manager add the total amount of the items you'd like to get to your total pledge. Our Custom Pledge Manager sent out later will then allow you to pick the specific add-on's you'd like before checkout!

This Kickstarter is a celebration of over 30 years of the greatest fighting game franchise of all-time! Please enjoy this Documentary detailing the history of the game from the 25th Anniversary!  
We view this as a premium product for fans of Street Fighter, tabletop games and collectable products. The costs of manufacturing a game like this are extremely high due to a number of factors including:  
Individual "Collector Sized" pre-painted special FX's miniatures that are comparable in size to ("Nintendo Amiibos") that can retail for around $14.99 each! And we are packing 8 of them into a single box! 24 in the World Warrior Pledge!
We have planned at least 12 Stretch Goal Fighter Miniatures and their Battle Decks as unlocks, each one of these are at no cost to our backers! This cuts heavily into our margins and makes offering this many free mini's impossible at Retail! So get them while you can!
This game has among the highest number of full sized top quality playing cards in a single tabletop game ever! 428 cards in the Street Fighter Pledge and each new character unlocked in Stretch Goals adds another 40 cards, an extremely expensive and costly inclusion! With all Stretch Goals unlocked and the World Warrior pledge that's over 1,548 cards! A ridiculous amount and again impossible at Retail!
Countless pieces of professional & unique artwork for each type of attack and event cards in a Character Deck!
The only way a game like this is made possible is to sell directly to our passionate backers who are looking for a premium and high-quality product. As lifelong fans of the franchise, we simply wanted to make the best possible game regardless of the cost! So jump in on this exclusive opportunity, you never know how valuable these limited pieces can become in the future!

Designed in Italy, MUtable is the design-oriented alternative to your child’s everyday play table, but paired with the flexibility and durability of a table that will last your family for years.
PLAY

MUtable 2.0 offers so many playing options that your kids will never stop having fun!   
MUtable 2.0 includes 4 double-sided playboards that stack on top of each other.     
Every MUtable includes all 4 height options, enabled by easily switching the table's legs. This way MUtable grows with your kid, all the way up to 8 years old!
 * MUtable is certified as toy for use from 3 years old
MUtable and its chairs come in five different colors, Mauve, Mint, White, Dove Gray and Tiffany, that you can mix and match according to your interior design style. 
When playtime's over, kids can easily push all the toys into the hole in the center to drop everything into the toy storage bag underneath. 
When they want to change games, they just need to flip the board and change bag. You can even organize different toys into different Toy Bags!
On each side of the table there is the option to attach up to 3 Side Toy Holders, a convenient cup-like container to store pencils and small toys. 
The Lego ® Tower is an extension of the Lego ® base, enabling kids to play on up to 3 different levels of Lego ®! Every level is double sided and compatible with both the Lego ® Duplo ® and classic Lego ®. 
Mix up the interchangeable scenarios to boost your kids' creativity!  More scenarios to choose from will be available after the campaign.
Pretend play has never been so much fun: with just one playhouse you will get 4 different environments to play and up to 24 rooms! No screws are needed to build the house and so it can be easily stored flat when is not used! You can choose between 2 different play houses:
Dolls House: includes a family house, a playground, a kindergarten and a museum!
Heroes House: includes a police station, a fireman station, a superhero cave and a mountain lodge
Board games are a fantastic way to exercise logic and tactical skills... but they can also be a way to learn new things! We developed 3 board games on 3 themes that are important for kids.
DISKcover Geography: On the double-sided map board, your child will travel around the globe and learn some of the main cultures and animals in the World! 
DISKcover History: Jump on your time machine and take a journey through time discovering some of the most relevant characters of human history! 
DISKcover Fruit & Vegetables: Two different games on one single board! On one side, an orchard where your child will take an adventurous trial picking fruit from trees and protecting it from spiteful insects, and twists. On the other side, a vegetable garden where to discover and grow many different vegetables! 
Puzzles are the best way to stimulate your kids creativity and critical thinking! We developed 6 round puzzles that perfectly fit the MUtable puzzle base. 
More space for more fun! The extension is a steady additional panel that will increase the surface of your MUtable. Up to 6 kids can play or have a seat at the same time...for twice the fun! Use the extension to let your kids play with their friends, have a meal or just have fun with bigger toys. And it is super easy to assemble; just place it on top of the table and fix it with the solid locks below. 
Included with the extension you will receive an additional disk to store pens and small toys and leave the surface even. 
With the cover, you can protect the MUtable and let your kids play without worries. This silicone top perfectly fits MUtable and shields it from any kind of damage from colors, water, food... 
Additionally, when you don't use it, the cover can be a convenient holder for all your MUtable disks!
Not only do MUtable chairs match perfectly with the table color of your choice, but they will also adjust to the four different heights with the table, ranging from a seat height of 23.5cm to 36cm. 
A backrest is included with each chair, but it can be removed to transform the MUtable chair into a stool comfortable for grown up players as well. 
You can add as many chairs as you wish with your MUtable... they are optional as we know that kids love to play in different ways! 
Also featured in: 
MUtable is 71.6cm large and each playboard has a diameter of 54cm. The extension is 98cm (38.5in) large.
Here you also find a table with all possible heights you can adjust your MUtable and chairs too! 
We are so thankful for checking out our project and helping us spreading the word!

News:
1. $385,000 stretch goal unlocked! 
2. All backers will receive a FREE metal Cthulhu d2 coin (gold color)

Elder Dice are perfect for any fantasy or horror roleplaying game. They are also ideal for upgrading the dice in your board games. We have designed three all new dice sets. Each comes packaged in a matching spellbook box with a magnetic closure. We also have tubes of six-sided dice in each design for anyone who needs to roll d6s by the fistful.
Prototypes and visualizations
Each set of Elder Dice contains a complete set of nine polyhedral gaming dice: 1 d4, 3 d6s, 1 d8, 1 d10, 1 d%(100), 1 d12, and 1 d20. Each is packaged in its own matching magnetic grimoire box.
Grimoires snap shut with a magnetic clasp.
Prototypes and visualizations
Visualizations and prototypes shown
If you pledge at the $19, $34 or $44 level you will choose which sets you would like after the campaign through PledgeManager. The $69 and $99 level backers will choose either the Unspeakable Tomes designs OR the Original Elder Dice designs. Shipping will be charged through PledgeManager after the campaign.
Visualizations and prototypes shown
Visualizations and prototypes shown
Elder Dice is ready to send to the manufacturer. All designs and artwork are completed, and the molds for the dice are already being created. We just need your help to fund its production. Without a successful Kickstarter campaign, Elder Dice: Unspeakable Tomes will not be manufactured. But there are also other reasons to back now:
Kickstarter backers receive a large discount off of retail prices.
Pledge for Kickstarter Exclusive rewards like the Unspeakable Tomes: Doom Edition playmat.
Your pledge can contain more Kickstarter Exclusive rewards if the stretch goals are unlocked.
Pledge through Kickstarter to be the first to have the new Elder Dice sets. We will send them to your door.
For all these reasons, make your pledge today to get Elder Dice on your gaming table!
Shipping will be charged through PledgeManager after the campaign closes. We calculate shipping based on the weight of the rewards and the handling fees charged by our different fulfillment partners. This allows us to keep shipping as low as possible for everyone. The following are estimated shipping costs by region. Your actual shipping charge will be calculated based on the items in your pledge after the campaign. 
We welcome any retailers who would like to support Elder Dice: Unspeakable Tomes. By backing the campaign your store can be among the first to get Elder Dice and it is the only way for your store to have Kickstarter exclusives for your customers. We offer wholesale pricing to verified retailers. Please contact us through the Kickstarter message system for information on how to make your pledge.
Elder Dice is a production of Infinite Black, LLC. Elder Dice are created by David LaRocca, an artist specializing in Lovecraftian horror, and Heath Robinson, a game designer and author.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We are very excited to bring Elder Dice to the gaming community. It's a privilege to be entrusted by so many people to bring this project to life. We will work hard to make sure it is as smooth as can be. Together David and Heath have completed a combined seven Kickstarter campaigns. Each Kickstarter project brings many valuable lessons learned. Because we have so much experience, we feel very confident in our ability to deliver a quality product to you.

We have allotted time to finalize the project at the conclusion of the campaign, and then we will roll right into production. We have been working with our manufacturing partner in China for months on these Elder Dice designs to be sure the manufacturing process goes as smoothly as possible. We have strong relationships with our international fulfillment partners. These are incredibly important and give us confidence in our ability to deliver your rewards in a safe and economical manner.

However, with our experience, we know that unexpected issues can arise during the production process. Final preparation after the Kickstarter campaign could take longer than expected. There can be manufacturing delays that are beyond our control. When the product is inspected for quality control, a flaw could be found and a part may have to be remade. We will not sacrifice quality, even if it pushes the schedule back!

Additionally, we will be freighting the Elder Dice around the world to our fulfillment partners who will then send the rewards to you. Shipping delays at sea, weather conditions, extended customs inspections, and more could potentially delay the project at this stage.

Also, please remember that the images shown on the Kickstarter page and in the video are prototypes. The final dice may differ in detail and color. But, when you support Elder Dice, we promise to keep you up to date about its progress from the campaign’s close all the way to when the dice are shipped. As you can see from our previous campaigns, we regularly post updates. We will let you know what we know, when we know it!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
